description.lang: The LED dimmer is a Z-Wave device that is used to switch ON/OFF and adjust light intensity of the connected LED light and can be controlled by other Z-Wave devices. The dimmer can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-batteryoperated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network.the device cannot act as Z-Wave network controller (primary or secondary), so a security enabled controller is needed for take full advantage of all functionally for the device. It also supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.The encryption modes that the LED dimmer supports are S0, S2 unauthenticated. When the LED dimmer is being included into a Z-Wave network, you can use your primary controller/gateway to enable one encryption mode or disable encryption. (The primary controller/gateway shall support encryption mode configuration).
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline

name.lang: Saving load state before power failure

description.lang: Saving load state before power failure
shutoff load
turn on load
save load state before power failure

name.lang: Enable/disable to send the basic report

description.lang: Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed (When value set as 1, re-power on the dimmer, it will send Basic report automatically
Disable to send Basic report
Enable to send Basic report

name.lang: Select the type of the light band

description.lang: Select the type of the light band
single color light band, 4 channels PWM output to drive 4 channels single color light band
CCT light band, 2 channels PWM output, R(B) controls warm white, G(W) controls cool white
RGBW light band, 4 channels PWM output to drive RGBW light band

name.lang: Choose a cool light stage mode

description.lang: receiving Command Class Switch Color, or switching light band type, it recovers to normal lighting mode.)Remarks: When parameter number 4 is set as single color light band, the valid values of this parameter are 0~2.
inactive of light stage mode
fade in and fade out mode, colors set by parameter 8
flash mode, colors set by parameter 8
rainbow mode, system fixed changing effect
fade in and fade out mode, color changes randomly
flash mode, color changes randomly
rainbow mode, color changes randomly
random mode, the colors switch randomly
Speed of stage mode
0 is the slowest, 255(0xFF) is the fastest
Execution times of stage mode
unlimited times
1~0xFF, execution times 1~255
The hue is only valid for fade in and fade outmode, flash mode
0~0xFF value of hue,only valid for fade in and fade out mode, flash mode

name.lang: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network

description.lang: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network (when enables this function, triple press the external switch within 1.5 seconds to be added to or removed from a network)
disable
enable
